title: Revolutionizing Logistics: TheCSRUniverse Interview with Ms. Priya Prakash, Co-Founder and Managing Director, Eco ... - The CSR Universe
summary: Eco Life Pallets, a game-changing solution championed by Priya Prakash, Co-Founder and Managing Director of Eco Pallet, is a greener alternative to traditional pallets, offering a potential glimpse into a greener future for logistics and supply chains. These innovative pallets are crafted from post-consumer recycled wood and a specialized coating, significantly reducing their carbon footprint. Priya, the sole woman entrepreneur in this sector, is committed to sustainable practices within India and plans for international expansion while staying true to the company's eco-conscious mission.
